verses.verse: And <WG1161> he spake <WG3004> a <WG2532> parable <WG3850> unto them <WG846> to this end, that men ought <WG1163> always <WG3842> to pray, <WG4336> and <WG2532> not <WG3361> to faint; <WG1573>

saying, <WG3004> There was <WG2258> in <WG1722> a <WG5100> city <WG4172> a <WG5100> judge, <WG2923> which feared <WG5399> not <WG3361> God, <WG2316> neither <WG2532> <WG3361> regarded <WG1788> man: <WG444>

And <WG1161> there was <WG2258> a widow <WG5503> in <WG1722> that <WG1565> city; <WG4172> and <WG2532> she came <WG2064> unto <WG4314> him, <WG846> saying, <WG3004> Avenge <WG1556> me <WG3165> of <WG575> mine <WG3450> adversary. <WG476>

And <WG2532> he would <WG2309> not <WG3756> for a while: <WG1909> <WG5550> but <WG1161> afterward <WG3326> <WG5023> he said <WG2036> within <WG1722> himself, <WG1438> Though <WG1499> I fear <WG5399> not <WG3756> God, <WG2316> nor <WG2532> <WG3756> regard <WG1788> man; <WG444>

Yet <WG1065> because this <WG5026> widow <WG5503> troubleth <WG3930> <WG2873> me, <WG3427> I will avenge <WG1556> her, <WG846> lest <WG3363> by her continual <WG1519> <WG5056> coming <WG2064> she weary <WG5299> me. <WG3165>
And <WG1161> the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> said, <WG2036> Hear <WG191> what <WG5101> the <WG3588> unjust <WG93> judge <WG2923> saith. <WG3004>

And <WG1161> shall not <WG3364> God <WG2316> avenge <WG4160> <WG1557> his own <WG848> elect, <WG1588> which cry <WG994> day <WG2250> and <WG2532> night <WG3571> unto <WG4314> him, <WG846> though <WG2532> he bear long <WG3114> with <WG1909> them? <WG846>

I tell <WG3004> you <WG5213> that <WG3754> he will avenge <WG4160> <WG1557> them <WG846> speedily. <WG1722> <WG5034> Nevertheless <WG4133> when the <WG3588> Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> cometh, <WG2064> shall <WG687> he find <WG2147> faith <WG4102> on <WG1909> the <WG3588> earth? <WG1093>

And <WG1161> he spake <WG2036> <WG2532> this <WG5026> parable <WG3850> unto <WG4314> certain <WG5100> which trusted <WG3982> in <WG1909> themselves <WG1438> that <WG3754> they were <WG1526> righteous, <WG1342> and <WG2532> despised <WG1848> others: <WG3062>

Two <WG1417> men <WG444> went up <WG305> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> temple <WG2411> to pray; <WG4336> the <WG3588> one <WG1520> a Pharisee, <WG5330> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> other <WG2087> a publican. <WG5057>

The <WG3588> Pharisee <WG5330> stood <WG2476> and prayed <WG4336> thus <WG5023> with <WG4314> himself, <WG1438> God, <WG2316> I thank <WG2168> thee, <WG4671> that <WG3754> I am <WG1510> not <WG3756> as <WG5618> other <WG3062> men <WG444> are, extortioners, <WG727> unjust, <WG94> adulterers, <WG3432> or <WG2228> even <WG2532> as <WG5613> this <WG3778> publican. <WG5057>
I fast <WG3522> twice <WG1364> in the <WG3588> week, <WG4521> I give tithes <WG586> of all <WG3956> that <WG3745> I possess. <WG2932>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> publican, <WG5057> standing <WG2476> afar off, <WG3113> would <WG2309> not <WG3756> lift up <WG1869> so much as <WG3761> his eyes <WG3788> unto <WG1519> heaven, <WG3772> but <WG235> smote <WG5180> upon <WG1519> his <WG848> breast, <WG4738> saying, <WG3004> God <WG2316> be merciful <WG2433> to me <WG3427> a sinner. <WG268>

I tell <WG3004> you, <WG5213> this man <WG3778> went down <WG2597> to <WG1519> his <WG848> house <WG3624> justified <WG1344> rather than <WG2228> the other: <WG1565> for <WG3754> every one <WG3956> that exalteth <WG5312> himself <WG1438> shall be abased; <WG5013> and <WG1161> he that humbleth <WG5013> himself <WG1438> shall be exalted. <WG5312>

And <WG1161> they brought <WG4374> unto him <WG846> also <WG2532> infants, <WG1025> that <WG2443> he would touch <WG680> them: <WG846> but <WG1161> when his disciples <WG3101> saw <WG1492> it, they rebuked <WG2008> them. <WG846>

But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> called <WG4341> them <WG846> unto him, and said, <WG2036> Suffer <WG863> little children <WG3813> to come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> me, <WG3165> and <WG2532> forbid <WG2967> them <WG846> not: <WG3361> for <WG1063> of such <WG5108> is <WG2076> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>

Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> Whosoever <WG3739> <WG1437> shall not <WG3361> receive <WG1209> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> as <WG5613> a little child <WG3813> shall in no wise <WG3364> enter <WG1525> therein. <WG1519> <WG846>

And <WG2532> a certain <WG5100> ruler <WG758> asked <WG1905> him, <WG846> saying, <WG3004> Good <WG18> Master, <WG1320> what <WG5101> shall I do <WG4160> to inherit <WG2816> eternal <WG166> life? <WG2222>

And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> Why <WG5101> callest <WG3004> thou me <WG3165> good? <WG18> none <WG3762> is good, <WG18> save <WG1508> one, <WG1520> that is, God. <WG2316>

Thou knowest <WG1492> the <WG3588> commandments, <WG1785> Do not <WG3361> commit adultery, <WG3431> Do not <WG3361> kill, <WG5407> Do not <WG3361> steal, <WG2813> Do not <WG3361> bear false witness, <WG5576> Honor <WG5091> thy <WG4675> father <WG3962> and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> mother. <WG3384>
And <WG1161> he <WG3588> said, <WG2036> All <WG3956> these <WG5023> have I kept <WG5442> from <WG1537> my <WG3450> youth <WG3503> up.

Now <WG1161> when Jesus <WG2424> heard <WG191> these things, <WG5023> he said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> Yet <WG2089> lackest <WG3007> thou <WG4671> one thing: <WG1520> sell <WG4453> all <WG3956> that <WG3745> thou hast, <WG2192> and <WG2532> distribute <WG1239> unto the poor, <WG4434> and <WG2532> thou shalt have <WG2192> treasure <WG2344> in <WG1722> heaven: <WG3772> and <WG2532> come, <WG1204> follow <WG190> me. <WG3427>
And <WG1161> when he <WG3588> heard <WG191> this, <WG5023> he was <WG1096> very sorrowful: <WG4036> for <WG1063> he was <WG2258> very <WG4970> rich. <WG4145>

And <WG1161> when Jesus <WG2424> saw <WG1492> that he <WG846> was <WG1096> very sorrowful, <WG4036> he said, <WG2036> How <WG4459> hardly <WG1423> shall they that have <WG2192> riches <WG5536> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of God! <WG2316>

For <WG1063> it is <WG2076> easier <WG2123> for a camel <WG2574> to go <WG1525> through <WG1223> a needle's <WG4476> eye, <WG5168> than <WG2228> for a rich man <WG4145> to enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>
And <WG1161> they that heard <WG191> it said, <WG2036> Who <WG5101> then <WG2532> can <WG1410> be saved? <WG4982>
And <WG1161> he <WG3588> said, <WG2036> The things which are impossible <WG102> with <WG3844> men <WG444> are <WG2076> possible <WG1415> with <WG3844> God. <WG2316>
Then <WG1161> Peter <WG4074> said, <WG2036> Lo, <WG2400> we <WG2249> have left <WG863> all, <WG3956> and <WG2532> followed <WG190> thee, <WG4671>

And <WG1161> he <WG3588> said <WG2036> unto them, <WG846> Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> There is <WG2076> no man <WG3762> that <WG3739> hath left <WG863> house, <WG3614> or <WG2228> parents, <WG1118> or <WG2228> brethren, <WG80> or <WG2228> wife, <WG1135> or <WG2228> children, <WG5043> for the kingdom of God's sake, <WG1752> <WG3588> <WG932> <WG2316>

Who <WG3739> shall not <WG3364> receive <WG618> manifold more <WG4179> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> present time, <WG2540> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> world <WG165> to come <WG2064> life <WG2222> everlasting. <WG166>

Then <WG1161> he took <WG3880> unto him the <WG3588> twelve, <WG1427> and said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them, <WG846> Behold, <WG2400> we go up <WG305> to <WG1519> Jerusalem, <WG2414> and <WG2532> all things <WG3956> that are written <WG1125> by <WG1223> the <WG3588> prophets <WG4396> concerning the <WG3588> Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> shall be accomplished. <WG5055>
For <WG1063> he shall be delivered <WG3860> unto the <WG3588> Gentiles, <WG1484> and <WG2532> shall be mocked, <WG1702> and <WG2532> spitefully entreated, <WG5195> and <WG2532> spitted on: <WG1716>
And <WG2532> they shall scourge <WG3146> him, and put him to death: <WG615> <WG846> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> third <WG5154> day <WG2250> he shall rise again. <WG450>

And <WG2532> they <WG846> understood <WG4920> none <WG3762> of these things: <WG5130> and <WG2532> this <WG5124> saying <WG4487> was <WG2258> hid <WG2928> from <WG575> them, <WG846> neither <WG2532> <WG3756> knew <WG1097> they the things which were spoken. <WG3004>

And <WG1161> it came to pass, <WG1096> that as he <WG846> was come nigh <WG1448> unto <WG1519> Jericho, <WG2410> a certain <WG5100> blind man <WG5185> sat <WG2521> by <WG3844> the <WG3588> way side <WG3598> begging: <WG4319>
And <WG1161> hearing <WG191> the multitude <WG3793> pass by, <WG1279> he asked <WG4441> what <WG5101> it <WG5124> meant. <WG1498>
And <WG1161> they told <WG518> him, <WG846> that <WG3754> Jesus <WG2424> of Nazareth <WG3480> passeth by. <WG3928>
And <WG2532> he cried, <WG994> saying, <WG3004> Jesus, <WG2424> thou son <WG5207> of David, <WG1138> have mercy <WG1653> on me. <WG3165>

And <WG2532> they which went before <WG4254> rebuked <WG2008> him, <WG846> that <WG2443> he should hold his peace: <WG4623> but <WG1161> he <WG846> cried <WG2896> so much <WG4183> the more, <WG3123> Thou son <WG5207> of David, <WG1138> have mercy <WG1653> on me. <WG3165>

And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> stood, <WG2476> and commanded <WG2753> him <WG846> to be brought <WG71> unto <WG4314> him: <WG846> and <WG1161> when he <WG846> was come near, <WG1448> he asked <WG1905> him, <WG846>
saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> wilt <WG2309> thou that I shall do <WG4160> unto thee? <WG4671> And <WG1161> he <WG3588> said, <WG2036> Lord, <WG2962> that <WG2443> I may receive my sight. <WG308>
And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> Receive thy sight: <WG308> thy <WG4675> faith <WG4102> hath saved <WG4982> thee. <WG4571>

And <WG2532> immediately <WG3916> he received his sight, <WG308> and <WG2532> followed <WG190> him, <WG846> glorifying <WG1392> God: <WG2316> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the <WG3588> people, <WG2992> when they saw <WG1492> it, gave <WG1325> praise <WG136> unto God. <WG2316>
